forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow and a slight chance of snow showers. Mostly cloudy. Low around 14, with temperatures rising to around 16 overnight. Wind chill values as low as 0. West northwest wind 7 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow and a slight chance of snow showers before 7am. Partly sunny, with a high near 22. West wind 6 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Light Snow Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow likely after 4am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 12, with temperatures rising to around 15 overnight. Wind chill values as low as -1. Southwest wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow likely before 11am. Cloudy, with a high near 32. West southwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow showers likely. Mostly cloudy. Low around 19, with temperatures rising to around 21 overnight. Northwest wind 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.shortForecast: Snow Showers Likely then Patchy Blowing Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow showers likely before 4pm, then patchy blowing snow and a slight chance of snow showers. Mostly cloudy. High near 27, with temperatures falling to around 25 in the afternoon. West wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow showers. Cloudy. Low around 21, with temperatures rising to around 28 overnight. Southwest wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow showers. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 34. West wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.
